solution_line_template: Tom earns {num_lawns_mowed} lawns * ${charge_per_lawn} per lawn = $<<{num_lawns_mowed}*{charge_per_lawn}={earnings_from_lawns}>>{earnings_from_lawns} per month.
Tom's profit last month was ${total_earnings} - ${gas_cost_per_month} gas money = $<<{total_earnings}-{gas_cost_per_month}={profit}>>{profit}.
